title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.1, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired [Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder][https://github.com/mozilla/inclusion]. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. title: Contributing to OnlineSalesIreland
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed). See guide create great issue advice.

title: Contributing to OnlineSalesIreland
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("MichaelSandilands/OnlineSalesIreland", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e. just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to OnlineSalesIreland
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use Air apply style, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to OnlineSalesIreland
text: Please note OnlineSalesIreland project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

what: Clean CSO data from wide to long format — clean_cso_data
title: Clean CSO data from wide to long format — clean_cso_data
text: Transforms wide-format CSO (Central Statistics Office) data tidy long format. Converts date columns proper date format standardizes column names.

title: Clean CSO data from wide to long format — clean_cso_data
Clean CSO data from wide to long format — clean_cso_data
text: data Raw CSO data frame statistics wide format value_name Name value column output

title: Clean CSO data from wide to long format — clean_cso_data
text: cleaned tibble columns: date, statistic, nace_group, specified value column

title: Clean CSO data from wide to long format — clean_cso_data
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Clean retail sales data retail_data <- csodata::cso_get_data("RSM08") clean_retail <- clean_cso_data(retail_data, "sales_index")  # Clean online turnover data online_data <- csodata::cso_get_data("RSM07") clean_online <- clean_cso_data(online_data, "turnover_pct") } # }

title: Get online turnover data — get_online_turnover
text: Retrieves cleans Irish online retail turnover data CSO dataset RSM07. Returns percentage turnover generated online sales NACE group.

title: Get online turnover data — get_online_turnover
text: cleaned tibble columns: date, statistic, nace_group, online_turnover_pct

what: Get retail sales index data — get_retail_sales_index
title: Get retail sales index data — get_retail_sales_index
text: Retrieves cleans Irish retail sales index data CSO dataset RSM08. Returns data tidy long format monthly observations NACE group.

title: Get retail sales index data — get_retail_sales_index
Get retail sales index data — get_retail_sales_index
text: cleaned tibble columns: date, statistic, nace_group, observation

title: Get retail sales index data — get_retail_sales_index

what: Get combined retail sales and online turnover data — get_retail_sales_with_online
title: Get combined retail sales and online turnover data — get_retail_sales_with_online
text: Combines retail sales index data online turnover percentages matching date NACE group. Provides comprehensive view retail performance including online component.

title: Get combined retail sales and online turnover data — get_retail_sales_with_online
Get combined retail sales and online turnover data — get_retail_sales_with_online
text: merged tibble retail sales index online turnover data
